short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you don't write it down, it will not be done

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the "Project Action Plan" chrome extension - the ultimate tool for staying organized and on track with all of your projects. With this extension, you can easily create an action plan for each of your projects, listing out everything you need to do to ensure successful completion.

Based on the plan by BestSelf co, the extension is user-friendly and intuitive, making it easy for anyone to start creating project plans right away. To begin, you'll be prompted to enter a name for your project, as well as a brief description.

Once you've created a new project, you can begin adding tasks to your action plan. Each task can be given a name, and due date. You can also add notes or additional information to each task to keep yourself organized.

Overall, the Project Planner chrome extension is an invaluable tool for anyone looking to stay organized and on top of multiple projects. It's easy to use, customizable, and designed to help you stay on track and achieve success. Try it out today and see the difference it can make in your productivity!

Release Notes:
- Minor update to remove all code that runs in the background
- Remove permission
- Improved color scheme
- Fixed date misalignment.
